meanings.definition: The front part of a person's head where the eyes, nose, and mouth are located.
meanings.sent1: She had a big smile on her face.
meanings.sent2: His face turned red when he was embarrassed.
meanings.sent3: The clown painted a silly face on a balloon.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline faced the ocean, offering a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured every detail of the woman's face in the portrait.

meanings.definition: The expression on a person's face that shows their emotions.
meanings.sent1: Her sad face made everyone worry about her.
meanings.sent2: His face lit up with joy when he saw his family.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's guilty face gave away who chewed the shoe.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph preserved the happy faces of the family.
meanings.sent5: The actor's face conveyed a range of emotions in the movie scene.

meanings.definition: To confront or deal with a difficult situation.
meanings.sent1: She had to face her fear of heights to climb the mountain.
meanings.sent2: He decided to face the challenge head-on.
meanings.sent3: The team will face a tough opponent in the final match.
meanings.sent4: She had to face the consequences of her actions.
meanings.sent5: Facing the storm, the sailor bravely steered the ship to safety.

meanings.definition: To be positioned towards a certain direction.
meanings.sent1: The house faces the park, providing a lovely view.
meanings.sent2: The window faces east, so it gets the morning sun.
meanings.sent3: The sign faced the wrong way, causing confusion for drivers.
meanings.sent4: The garden faces the mountains, creating a serene setting.
meanings.sent5: The hotel room faces the ocean, offering a stunning panorama.

meanings.definition: To cover the surface of something.
meanings.sent1: The chef will face the cake with smooth frosting.
meanings.sent2: She decided to face the table with a beautiful tablecloth.
meanings.sent3: The workers will face the wall with colorful tiles.
meanings.sent4: The artist will face the canvas with bold strokes of paint.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter will face the door with a layer of varnish.
